name: Mr Boggis
text: Take $2; if possible; from every other player

name: Mr Bent
text: Place this card in front of you and take a loan of $10 from the bank. At the end of the game you must pay back $12 or lose 15 point.

name: The Beggars' Guild
text: Select one player. They must give you two cards of their choice.

name: The Bank of Ankh-Morpork
text: Place this card in front of you and take a loan of $10 from the bank. At the end of the game you must pay back $12 or lose 15 point.

name: The Ankh-Morpork Sunshine Dragon Sanctuary
text: Each player must give you either $1 or one of their cards.

name: The Dysk
text: Earn $1 for each minion in The Isle of Gods.

name: The Duckman
text: Move a minion belonging to another player from one area to adjacent area.

name: Drumknott
text: Play any two other cards from your hand.

name: CMOT Dibbler
text: Roll the die. On a roll of '7' or more you take $4 from the bank. On a roll of '1' you must pay $2 to the bank or remove one of your minions from the board. All other results have no effect.

name: Mrs Cake
text: Look at all but one of the unused Personality cards.

name: Gaspode
text: Stop a player from moving or removing one of your minions.

name: Fresh Start Club
text: If you have a minion removed you can place him in a different area.

name: Foul Ole Ron
text: Move a minion belonging to another player from one area to an adjacent area.

name: The Fool's Guild
text: Select another player. If they do not give $5 then place this card in from of them. This card now counts towards their hand size of five cards when they come to refill their hand. They cannot get rid of this card.

name: The Fire Bridge
text: Choose a player. If he does not pay you $5 then you can remove one of his building from the board.

name: History Monks
text: Shuffle the discard pile and draw four cards randomly.Place the remaining cards back as the discard pile.

name: Hex
text: Take three cards from he draw deck.

name: Here's Now
text: Roll the die. On a roll of '7' or more you take $3 from a player of your choice. On a roll of '1' you must remove one of your minions from the board. All other results have no effect.

name: Harry King
text: Discard as many cadrs as you wish and take $2 for each one discarded.

name: The Opera House
text: Earn $1 for each minion in The Isle of Gods.

name: Nobby Nobbs
text: Take $3 from a player of your choice.

name: Modo
text: Discard one card.

name: Librarian
text: Take four cards from the draw deck.

name: Leonard of Quirm
text: Take four cards from the draw deck.

name: Shonky Shop
text: Discard as many cadrs as you wish and take $1 for each one discarded.

name: Sacharissa Cripslock
text: Earn $1 for each trouble marker on the board.

name: Rosie Palm
text: Choose one player. Give them one of your cards. They must give you $2 in return.

name: Rincewind
text: Move one of your minions from an area containing a trouble marker to an adjancent area.

name: Queen Molly
text: Select one player. They must give you two cards of their choice.

name: Zorgo
text: You may exchange your Personality card with one drawn randomly from those not in use.

name: Dr Whiteface
text: Select another player. If they do not give $5 then place this card in from of them. This card now counts towards their hand size of five cards when they come to refill their hand. They cannot get rid of this card.

name: Wallace Sonky
text: You cannot be affected by the text on a card played by another player.

name: The Seamstresses Guild
text: Choose one player.Give them one of your card. They must give you $2 in return.

name: Mr Pin Mr Tulip
text: The New Firm.

name: The Thieves' Guild
text: Take $2; if possible; From every other player.

name: Sergeant
text: Take two cards from the draw deck.

name: Otto Chriek
text: Earn $1 for each trouble marker on the board.

name: The Clacks
text: Take two cards from the draw deck.

name: Cosmo Lavish
text: Pay another player $2. They must then remove one minion of their choice(not one of yours) from an area with a trouble marker in it.

name: The Dean
text: Remove one minion from Unreal Estate.

name: Burleigh
text: Pay a player of your choice $2. Then choose a minion to assassinate.

name: The Bursar
text: Exchange the positions of any two minions on the board

name: Cable Street Particulars
text: Select one player. Look at his cards. Choose one of them to be discarded.

name: Canting Crew
text: Move a minion belonging to another player from one area to an adjacent area.

name: Carcer
text: Roll the die twice and remove one minion of your choice from those areas; even if there is no trouble there.

name: The Chair of Indefinite Studies
text: Exchange your hand with that of another player.

name: Sir Charles Lavatory
text: Earn $1 for each building on the board (any colour).

name: Dorfl
text: Move one of your minions from one area to any other area on the board.

name: Deep Dwarves
text: Place a minion in any area and do not place a trouble marker.

name: Adora Belle Dearheart
text: Move one of your minions from one area to any other area on the board.

name: The Alchemists Guild
text: Discard up to three cards and refill your hand to five cards.

name: The Auditors
text: Every other player; in player order; must remove one of their minions from the board.

name: Susan
text: Stop one of your minions from being removed from the board.

name: Sybil Vimes
text: Replace another player's building with one of your own. Pay the cost of the building to the original owner. It must be an area that does not have a trouble marker.

name: Wee Mad Arthur
text: You may build a building for half price.

name: William de Worde
text: Earn $1 for each trouble marker on the board.

name: Willikins
text: Place one minion in an area that you have a building in.

name: Archchancellor
text: Place one or two minions in or adjacent to Unreal Estate.

name: The Senior Wrangler
text: Place one minion in or adjacent to Unreal Estate.

name: Mr Shine
text: Place a minion in any area and do not place a trouble marker.

name: Mr Slant
text: Choose an area containing a trouble marker and receive $2 for each minion there.

name: The Smoking Gnu
text: Place one minion in an area containing a trouble marker.

name: Stanley
text: Select wo cards randomly from one player and choose one to keep. Return the other card.

name: Moist von Lipwig
text: Take two cards from the draw deck.

name: Doctor Mossy Lawn
text: Interrupt your own turn. Your turn finishs but do not discard the card you played before this one.

name: Ponder Stibbons
text: Play any two other cards from your hand.

name: The Post Office
text: Take $1 for each building on the board.

name: Reacher Gilt
text: You can replace another player's building with one of your own. Pay the cost of the building to the original owner. It must be an area that has a trouble marker in it.

name: Professor of Recent Runes
text: Take two cards from the draw deck.

name: Doctor Hix
text: Place a trouble marker in an area of your choice.

name: Hobsons's Livery Stable
text: Pay $2 to a player of your choice. Then move one of your minions to any area you wish.

name: Hubert
text: Force one player to give another player $3 (you cannot choose yourself).

name: Igor
text: If you have a minion removed you can place him in a different area.

name: The Luggage
text: Discard one card.

name: The Mob
text: Place one trouble marker in an area adjacent to one already containing a trouble marker.

name: Errol
text: Roll the die. On a roll of '7' or more you remove a minion of your choice from an area containing a trouble marker. On a roll of '1' you must remove one of your own minions.

name: Gargoyles
text: Draw one card for each building you have on the board.
